item.title: Building Bad Lambda
item.description: Here's a small confession, when I first joined the ECS team, I'd spun up a container exactly once in my entire life and had no idea how to use ECS, at all. There was around a month between when I accepted the ECS offer and when I'd actually start on the team, so this was my window to learn about containers, ECS, Fargate and everything else that I didn't know anything about.
